casebody.data:
Jonathan E. BRUNSON, Plaintiff,
v.
OFFICE OF the NORTH CAROLINA GENERAL ASSEMBLY, Office of the Governor of the State of North Carolina, Office of the 12th Judiciary, Office of the Clerk of Cumberland County, Office of the District Attorney for the 12th Prosecutorial District, Office of the Sheriff of Cumberland County, Office of the Public Defender for the 12th Defender District, North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services, North Carolina Department of Social Services, North Carolina Department of Public Safety, North Carolina Department of Justice, Office of the Clerk of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, Office of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, North Carolina Department of Human Resources, and the State of North Carolina, Defendants. No. COA18-567 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 18, 2018

DISMISSED.
